p: In this study, we selected the Qinling Mountains as our study area. The Qinling Mountains are one of the main producing areas of medicinal materials and plants. And this area also contains a large number of endangered geoherbs ( Dang et al., 2010; Lu et al., 2012). Climate change will certainly affect the Qinling Mountains climate, which will inevitably affect the habitable environment and moisture and temperature conditions in the Qinling Mountains ( Fan et al., 2014), thus affecting herb spatial patterns and quality in the region.
